alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 11:15AM CST until March 11 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Lawrenceville. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Kelly`s Lake Lane, 1160N, is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CST Sunday the stage was 32.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 AM CST Sunday was 32.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 33.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Embarras River Lawrenceville 30.0 32.1 Sun 10 am CS 33.1 32.6 32.3 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
